Posts.Content: Jan 16, 2009 12:00AM kimberlyjo wrote: Hello All,   I'm Kimberly. This is my first post, but I have read and done research since my Dx. Thanks for all your advice and tips. It is really hard to be 35, and going through this alone. BC does not run in my family. Out of four girls, I am the first to get it. My sisters now know they have a 50/50 chance of getting BC before the age of 50. I will be starting Chemo on Tues. I've already looked for wigs. I even called the Pastor of my church to ask permission to wear a hat inside church if the wig does not arrive on time.  I hope all my sisters are doing well with their treatment.
Posts.Title: Starting chemo January 2009? lisalisa ktym
